query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ad_projects` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `user_id` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `video_source` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `video_url` text,
  `video_key` varchar(500),
  `video_duration` int,
  `status` enum('processing','completed','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'processing',
  `script_data` text,
  `audio_url` text,
  `audio_key` varchar(500),
  `error_message` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `completed_at` timestamp NULL,
  CONSTRAINT `ad_projects_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `ad_projects_user_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ad_units` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `project_id` int NOT NULL,
  `timestamp` int NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('nota_introdutoria','descricao') NOT NULL,
  `text` text NOT NULL,
  `audio_url` text,
  `audio_key` varchar(500),
  `order` int NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `ad_units_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `ad_units_project_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`project_id`) REFERENCES `ad_projects`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ad_units` (
